function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of antibacterial and antiviral materials","Impact":"Increased risk of viral and bacterial contamination in the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular and constant disinfection of spaces, especially frequently touched surfaces","Technologies":"Use of antibacterial and antiviral materials, steam appliances, and appropriate cleaning products","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning staff, and homeowners"},{"Description":"Inequality in housing conditions","Impact":"Increased stress, aggressivity, and public health challenges, especially among the disadvantaged","Mitigation":"Providing adequate space, terraces, and gardens, and addressing overcrowding and quality of dwellings","Technologies":"Policy interventions to improve housing conditions, urban planning for better housing distribution","People":"Disadvantaged individuals and communities","Owner":"Policymakers, urban planners, and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Unresolved past problems related to housing quality","Impact":"Continued risk of public health issues and housing-related challenges","Mitigation":"Establishing updated and rigorous requirements for the built environment and residences","Technologies":"Implementation of building codes, standards for housing quality, and monitoring systems","People":"Residents of the built environment","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, housing agencies, and local government"}]}
